original_text: “On that day every prophet will be ashamed of his vision when he prophesies. He will not put on a hairy cloak in order to deceive,
korean_text: 그 날에 선지자들이 예언할 때에 그 환상을 각기 부끄러워할 것이며 사람을 속이려고 털옷도 입지 아니할 것이며

sentences.original_text: every prophet will be ashamed of his vision
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 선지자가 자기의 이상을 부끄러워할 것이요

sentences.original_text: He will not put on a hairy cloak
